mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( username, password, phone, email ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{email} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, phone, email, role, status, balance, last_login_time, create_time, update_time FROM user WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, username, password, phone, email, role, status, balance, last_login_time, create_time, update_time FROM user WHERE username = #{account} OR phone = #{account} LIMIT 1
